headline: Franklin Resources, Inc. (BEN): One of the Cheap Dividend Stocks Being Targeted by Short Sellers
summary: We recently published a list of the 25 Cheap Dividend Stocks Being Targeted by Short Sellers. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) stands against other cheap dividend stocks. Short sellers — investors who profit from falling stock prices —are seeing a surge in success in 2025. […]
